alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 1:26PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL LEA COUNTY THROUGH 200 PM MDT... At 125 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Monument, or 18 miles northwest of Eunice, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monument. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Southern Lea County
